quant¶

plc_type.quant

random_closed_plane_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Generate random length 2 planar polygons of nEdges edges using the symmetric measure of Cantarella, Deguchi, Shonkwiler

random_closed_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Generate random length 2 space polygons of nEdges edges using the symmetric measure of Cantarella, Deguchi, Shonkwiler

random_equilateral_closed_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Random equilateral polygons (this uses a hedgehog/fold combination method). They are scaled to total length 2 in order to be comparable to the polygons generated by the other methods.

random_equilateral_open_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Random equilateral polygons (this uses a hedgehog/fold combination method). They are scaled to total length 2 in order to be comparable to the polygons generated by the other methods.

random_open_plane_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Generate random length 2 planar polygons of nEdges edges using the symmetric measure of Cantarella, Deguchi, Shonkwiler

random_open_polygon(RandomGenerator r, int nEdges) → PlCurve¶

Generate random length 2 space polygons of nEdges edges using the symmetric measure of Cantarella, Deguchi, Shonkwiler
